title: Whitepaper v0.3 Updates
body:
Minor roadmap adjustments and Tokenomics revision. 

Update Summary
Basically, we included eArting.org in the roadmap and released the voting platform URL in Blockchain, based on eart.eth and vote.artisticsociety.org, published the evidence of Lock in liquidity pool until 06/28/2022, plus Tokenomics changes allocating 1.25 % per year for 10 years to sponsor cultural projects, social donations and holders' awards, starting when the market value reaches 11 million dollars.

Voting will be open for all eArt holders until 5 pm on 10/08/2021. If approved by more than 50% of the voting Holders, the current published version will be superseded and made available at https://artisticsociety.org/whitepaper.pdf and https://artisticsociety.org/whitepaper-ptbr.pdf

Special thanks to all holders, Glauceste Saturnio and Hubchain Technologies.

Release
English - https://earting.org/whitepaper-v-03-updates/
Portuguese - https://earting.org/pt-br/atualizacao-v0-3-do-whitepaper/

Whitepaper PDF v0.3 for the approval
English - https://artisticsociety.org/whitepaper-v0.3.pdf
Portuguese - https://artisticsociety.org/whitepaper-v0.3-en.pdf
choices: Yes, I vote for the approval
No, I vote against the approval
author: 0x8C345Db1c9E2B5188F7A7f4977383F63b430C430
